li: High quality picture for the advertisement
Description for the advertisement (300 characters max)
Address (only relevant for advertisements that have a physical address)

Advertisement address (your advertisement can appear anywhere in the world). For example your event might be in New York but you want to attract people from London. Therefore, London is the advertisement address

additional_month.#text: for each additional month (must be paid in advance)

advertise_teaser.#text: A location based advertisement that only the 100 people closest nearby see.

advertise_text.#text: Amikumu is a social network that provides speakers, signers and users of all the world's languages with a platform to communicate and share relevant information locally. Our users are primarily polyglots and speakers of minority languages.

complete_analysis_part1.#text: For a complete analysis of our language stats please see our

in_app_collectible_badges_text.#text: An in-app collectible badge that appears on the user's profile page. Perfect for advertising large-scale meetups, language festivals or seminars and for providing an additional award for participation in events.

metadata_desc.#text: Find and connect instantly with local language partners nearby. We are the only app that supports 7,000+ languages including Catalan, Chinese, Dutch, Esperanto, Irish, Japanese, Occitan, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Toki Pona and Welsh, all for FREE!

prices_assume.#text: The above prices assume that your advertisement is targeting only one language. For each additional language, there is an extra 4â‚¬ a month fee. There are no additional setup fees.

purchase_email_text_part2.#text: with the above details for each language advertisement.

purchase_info.#text: All advertisement purchases must be conducted in English or Esperanto.
